titleStmt.title: Certaine sermons, first preached, and after published at severall times, by M. Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor at Rotherhith. And now gathered together into one volume: the severall texts and titles whereof are set downe in the leafe following
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

titleStmt.title: Certaine sermons, first preached, and after published at severall times, by M. Thomas Gataker B. of D. and pastor at Rotherhith. And now gathered together into one volume: the severall texts and titles whereof are set downe in the leafe following
titleStmt.author: Gataker, Thomas, 1574-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Iohn Haviland and Anne Griffin,

notesStmt.note: The title page to "Davids instructer" (A1r) names Anne Griffin as printer. Variant 1: this title page names John Haviland. The title page to "A sparke toward the kindling of sorrow for Sion" (3D6r) has "printed by A.G. for Hen. Overton" in imprint. Variant 2: this imprint lacks Overton's name--STC.
One of four imprint variants of this edition.
Reproduction of original in the Manchester College Library, Oxford University, Oxford, England.
